radiographic_examinations.findings: Ring-enhancing left frontoparietal mass with edema.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up MRI done 5 months later showed improvement in the brain abscess; increased MRI signal on T1-weighted sequences from the globus pallidus to the substantia nigra was also noted.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic telangiectasia and prominent vessels; early opacification of the left portal vein provided evidence of arterial-portal shunting.
